title: Bobby Gets A Jeweler To Send Him A Pearl Necklace + Amy Gives Her Report On Hank Williams Jr. + Bobby Says It’s Okay To Overreact To Coronavirus
itunes:title: Bobby Gets A Jeweler To Send Him A Pearl Necklace + Amy Gives Her Report On Hank Williams Jr. + Bobby Says It’s Okay To Overreact To Coronavirus
description:
Bobby talks with Nikki from Rogers & Hollands Jewelers in Chicago. He asks her if pearl necklaces are a good idea for men. Amy shares her two minute book report on Hank Williams Jr.. Plus, Bobby responds to the latest coronavirus news regarding Tom Hanks, cancelled NBA games and banned overseas travel. He says it’s okay to overact when it comes to health issues.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
